sqlQuery.name: SearchMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, project_id, search_name, steps_count, start_date, end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id,search_name, steps_count, start_date, end_date FROM sfischer.SEARCHESSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ ORDER BY steps_count desc,search_name asc,project_id asc )
